Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. This product is truly exceptional and I believe it holds immense value for you, just like it does for me. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $11,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a discounted rate, considering its original value is $12,000. I trust this offer will be favorable to you and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
